item.title: 伊石油在推进页岩油开采过程中加大撤资力度，出售旗下公司
item.description: 阿根廷国营石油公司 YPF SA 正在着手出售多个业务部门和股权，该公司的撤资计划旨在集中精力发展瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩矿区。【原文：Argentina’s state-run oil company, YPF SA, is moving to sell several business units and stakes as a divestment plan aimed at focusing its efforts on heralded shale patch Vaca Muerta gathers steam.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦对卡扎甘石油巨头的索赔增至 1600 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，哈萨克斯坦对开发卡沙干油田的国际石油巨头集团提出的仲裁索赔金额已超过 1,600 亿美元，因为哈萨克斯坦指控某些交易存在腐败问题。【原文：Kazakhstan’s arbitration claims against a group of international oil majors that developed the Kashagan field escalated above $160 billion after the country alleged some deals were tainted by corruption, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 克利夫兰抵制新体育馆计划，布朗队体育场紧张局势加剧
item.description: 克利夫兰正面临着失去其长期效力的美国国家橄榄球联盟球队的风险，因为双方对体育场的愿景各执一词。【原文：Cleveland is at risk of losing its longtime National Football League team over competing visions for a stadium.】

item.title: 萨默斯呼吁美国证券交易委员会和交易所调查周一 VIX 指数飙升事件
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）周一敦促美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）和相关交易所调查最受关注的美国金融波动性指标历史性的飙升。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers urged the Securities and Exchange Commission and relevant exchanges to look into the historic surge in the most-watched gauge of US financial volatility on Monday.】

item.title: 法国银行称奥运会将推动法国经济增长
item.description: 法国中央银行的月度调查显示，巴黎奥运会将推动法国第三季度经济加速增长。【原文：The Paris Olympics will drive an acceleration in French economic growth in the third quarter, according to a monthly survey by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 合作伙伴集团考虑在 9 月启动 Techem 首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Partners Group Holding AG 正在考虑最快于 9 月份启动德国计量公司 Techem GmbH 的首次公开募股。【原文：Partners Group Holding AG is considering a launch of the initial public offering of German metering company Techem GmbH as soon as September, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储降息在即，美国银行客户转而反对美元
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）的一项调查显示，在过去一个月里，随着市场为美联储降息做准备，相信美元将走软的投资者比例几乎增加了两倍。【原文：The share of investors who are convinced the dollar will weaken has almost tripled over the past month as the market braces for interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve, according to a Bank of America survey.】

item.title: 波动率专家称周一创纪录的 VIX 指数飙升是假象
item.description: 从表面上看，这是一场旷世股灾，是一代人中罕见的激荡，在全球市场引起了强烈反响。但是，如果周一的剧烈波动事件并不像看上去那样呢？【原文：On the surface it was a stock shock for the ages, a once-in-a-generation spike in turbulence that reverberated through global markets. But what if Monday’s extreme volatility event wasn’t quite what it seemed?】

item.title: 英国股票销售带来回报，推动伦敦资本市场发展
item.description: 据经纪商 Peel Hunt Ltd. 称，伦敦上市公司近期的股票发行为投资者带来了回报，这是伦敦金融城努力重振新股上市热情的一个积极信号。【原文：Recent share offerings from London-listed companies have delivered returns for investors, a positive sign for the City as it strives to revive sentiment for new listings, according to broker Peel Hunt Ltd.】

item.title: 老虎支持前发动机公司 1 号高管彭纳的新激进主义基金
item.description: 三年多前，查理-彭纳（Charlie Penner）带头发起了反对埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）的历史性股东运动。【原文：Charlie Penner, who spearheaded a historic shareholder campaign against Exxon Mobil Corp. more than three years ago, got backing from the late Julian Robertson’s Tiger Management for a new fund that will press corporations for change.】

item.title: 尼日利亚企业因 24 亿美元外汇索赔争议陷入危机
item.description: 西非国家的一个生产商机构称，由于尼日利亚央行未能结清 24 亿美元的逾期外汇远期合约，尼日利亚企业正陷入 "严重危机"。【原文：Nigerian firms are in a “severe crisis” over the central bank’s failure to settle $2.4 billion of overdue foreign exchange forward contracts, a manufacturing body for producers in the West African nation said.】

item.title: 巴菲特抛售苹果股票将重塑主要股价指标

item.title: 大卫-布斯的 Dimensional 激起了人们对被动投资的旧有恐惧
item.description: 长期以来，华尔街一直认为被动投资的最大缺陷之一正在逐渐消失。维度基金顾问公司（Dimensional Fund Advisors）却不这么认为。【原文：Wall Street has long thought that one of passive investing’s biggest flaws was fading away. Not so fast, says Dimensional Fund Advisors.】

item.title: 加拿大就业增长停滞；失业率维持在 6.4
item.description: 加拿大连续第二个月意外减少就业岗位，失业率保持在两年多来的最高水平，这使得加拿大央行有望进一步降息。【原文：Canada unexpectedly shed jobs for a second straight month and the unemployment rate held at the highest level in more than two years, keeping the Bank of Canada on track to further cut interest rates.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行从道明银行聘请斯蒂芬-斯图尔特（Stephen Stewart）领导加拿大并购业务
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）聘请斯蒂芬-斯图尔特（Stephen Stewart）负责在加拿大的并购业务，为其在加拿大的业务发展增添了一位资深银行家。【原文：Barclays Plc has hired Stephen Stewart to oversee mergers and acquisitions in Canada, adding a veteran banker as it tries to boost its business in the country.】

item.title: 格雷格-科菲的对冲基金公司达成首笔私人信贷交易
item.description: 格雷格-科菲（Greg Coffey）的 Kirkoswald 资产管理公司（Kirkoswald Asset Management）以其流动性宏观交易策略而闻名，该公司正在进军蓬勃发展的私人信贷行业。【原文：Greg Coffey’s Kirkoswald Asset Management, best known for its liquid macro trading strategy, is breaking into the booming private-credit industry.】

item.title: 投资者寻求资金购买葡萄牙本菲卡足球俱乐部股份
item.description: 包括新月资本（Crescent Capital）联合创始人在内的投资集团 Lenore Sports Partners 正在寻求筹集约 4900 万欧元（5400 万美元）的资金，用于收购葡萄牙足球俱乐部本菲卡（Benfica）的股份。【原文：Lenore Sports Partners, an investment group that includes the co-founder of Crescent Capital, is looking to raise about €49 million ($54 million) to fund a potential purchase of a stake in the Portuguese football club Benfica.】

item.title: 巴西通胀再次加速，央行压力倍增
item.description: 巴西的年度通胀率加速上升，达到目标范围的上限，这对央行来说是又一次打击，因为央行正在努力遏制蔓延到整个拉丁美洲最大经济体的价格压力。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation accelerated to the upper limit of the target range, dealing another blow to the central bank as it works to contain price pressures spreading throughout Latin America’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 交易员轮番抛售土耳其银行股，推动本周大跌
item.description: 土耳其银行股将创下一年多来的最大单周跌幅，原因是长期高利率的前景促使投资者从该行业的大幅反弹中获利了结，转而青睐非金融类股票。【原文：Shares in Turkish banks are headed for their biggest weekly drop in more than a year, as the prospect of high-for-longer interest rates prompted investors to take profit off the sector’s massive rally in favor of non-financial stocks.】

item.title: 巴西资产管理公司正在筹建私人信贷基金
item.description: 巴西最大的保险公司之一的资产管理部门 SulAmerica Investimentos 正在筹划其首个专注于项目融资的私人信贷基金，因为普通地方债券的利差缩小，挤压了更多传统基金的回报。【原文：SulAmerica Investimentos, the asset-management arm of one of Brazil’s largest insurance companies, is planning its first private-credit fund focused on project financing as spreads for plain-vanilla local bonds shrink, squeezing returns for more traditional funds.】

item.title: 据说 WeRide 将在美国 IPO 和配售中寻求高达 4 亿美元的融资
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国的 WeRide 公司正在美国首次公开募股和同时进行的私募中寻求高达 4 亿美元的资金。【原文：China’s WeRide Inc. is seeking as much as $400 million in a US initial public offering and concurrent private placement, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国央行研究缩小利率走廊计划

item.title: 挪威认为国防开支扩大了长期财政需求
